title: Hero MotoCorp sales up 3 per cent in June
description: ​​​ The company had sold 4,69,160 units in the corresponding month of the previous year, Hero MotoCorp said in a statement. In the domestic market, sales rose to 4,63,210 units last month from 4,38,514 units in June 2021. Exports last month stood at 21,657 units as against 30,646 units in the year-ago period.
